historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Eran las diez de la noche, piloteaba mi nave.

english.contextual: It was ten o'clock at night, I was piloting my ship.
english.literal: It was the ten of the night, I was piloting my ship.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Era mi taxi un Volkswagen del año 68.

english.contextual: My taxi was a 1968 Volkswagen.
english.literal: Was my taxi a Volkswagen of the year 68.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Era un día de esos malos, donde no hubo pasaje.

english.contextual: It was one of those bad days where there were no passengers.
english.literal: It was a day of those bad, where not there was passage.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Las lentejuelas de un traje me hicieron la parada.

english.contextual: The sequins of a suit got me a fare.
english.literal: The sequins of a suit me did the stop.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Era una rubia preciosa, llevaba minifalda.

english.contextual: She was a gorgeous blonde, wearing a miniskirt.
english.literal: Was a blonde precious, she was wearing miniskirt.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: El escote en su espalda llegaba justo a la gloria.

english.contextual: The low-cut neckline on her back went right to the glory.
english.literal: The neckline in her back arrived just to the glory.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Una lágrima negra rodaba en su mejilla.

english.contextual: A single black tear rolled down her cheek.
english.literal: A tear black rolled in her cheek.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Mientras que el retrovisor decía: ¡Ve qué pantorrillas!

english.contextual: Meanwhile the rearview mirror said: Check out those calves!
english.literal: While that the rearview mirror said: See what calves!

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Yo vi un poco más.

english.contextual: I saw a little more.
english.literal: I saw a little more.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Eran las diez con cuarenta, zigzagueava en reforma.

english.contextual: It was ten forty, swerving through Reforma avenue.
english.literal: They were the ten with forty, zigzagueing in Reforma.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Me dijo: Me llamo Norma, mientras cruzaba la pierna.

english.contextual: She said: My name is Norma, as she crossed her leg.
english.literal: She said to me: I call myself Norma, while I crossed the leg.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Sacó un cigarro, algo extraño, de esos que te dan risa.

english.contextual: She pulled out a cigarette, a strange one, of those that make you laugh.
english.literal: She took out a cigarette, something strange, of those that to you give laugh.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Le ofrecí fuego de prisa y me temblaba la mano.

english.contextual: I quickly offered her a light, and my hand was shaking.
english.literal: To her I offered fire of hurry and to me trembled the hand.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Le pregunté por quién llora y me dijo: Por un tipo que se cree que por rico, puede venir a engañarme.

english.contextual: I asked her who she was crying for, and she said: For a guy who thinks that because he's rich, he can come and deceive me.
english.literal: To her I asked for who cries and to me she said: For a type that himself believes that for rich, can come to deceive me.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: No caiga usted por amores, debe de levantarse (le dije).

english.contextual: Don't fall for love, you should get up (I told her).
english.literal: No fall you for loves, must of get up (to her I said).

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Cuente con un servidor, si lo que quiere es vengarse.

english.contextual: Count on me if you want revenge.
english.literal: Count with a server, if what you want is to avenge yourself.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Y me sonrió.

english.contextual: And she smiled at me.
english.literal: And me smiled.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista seduciendo a la vida?

english.contextual: What does a taxi driver do seducing life?
english.literal: What is what does a taxi driver seducing to the life?

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista construyendo una herida?

english.contextual: What is a taxi driver doing building a wound?
english.literal: What is what does a taxi driver building a wound?

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista enfrente de una dama?

english.contextual: What does a taxi driver do in front of a lady?
english.literal: What is what does a taxi driver in front of a lady?

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista con sus sueños de cama?

english.contextual: What does a taxi driver do with his bed dreams?
english.literal: What is what does a taxi driver with his dreams of bed?

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Me pregunté.

english.contextual: I wondered.
english.literal: Myself I asked.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Lo vi abrazando y besando a una humilde muchacha.

english.contextual: I saw him hugging and kissing a humble girl.
english.literal: Him I saw hugging and kissing to a humble girl.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Es de clase muy sencilla, lo sé por su facha.

english.contextual: She's from a very simple class, I know it by her looks.
english.literal: Is of class very simple, it I know by her appearance.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Me sonreía en el espejo y se sentaba de lado.

english.contextual: She smiled at me in the mirror and sat sideways.
english.literal: To me smiled in the mirror and herself sat of side.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Yo estaba idiotizado con el espejo empañado.

english.contextual: I was mesmerized by the fogged mirror.
english.literal: I was idiotized with the mirror fogged.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Me dijo: Doble en la esquina, iremos hasta mi casa.

english.contextual: He told me: Turn on the corner, we'll go to my house.
english.literal: To me said: Turn on the corner, we will go to my house.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Después de un par de tequilas, veremos que es lo que pasa.

english.contextual: After a couple of tequilas, we'll see what happens.
english.literal: After of a pair of tequilas, we will see that is what happens.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Para qué describir lo que hicimos en la alfombra.

english.contextual: Why describe what we did on the carpet.
english.literal: For what describe what we did in the carpet.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Si basta con resumir que le besé hasta la sombra.

english.contextual: If it's enough to summarize that I kissed her until the shadow.
english.literal: If is enough with summarize that to her I kissed until the shadow.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Y un poco más.

english.contextual: And a little more.
english.literal: And a little more.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: No se sienta usted tan sola, sufro, aunque no es lo mismo.

english.contextual: Don't feel so alone, I suffer, although it's not the same.
english.literal: No you feel yourself so alone, I suffer, although not it is the same.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Mi mujer y mi horario han abierto un abismo.

english.contextual: My wife and my work schedule have opened a chasm.
english.literal: My woman and my schedule have opened a chasm.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Cómo se sufre ambos lados de las clases sociales.

english.contextual: How both sides of the social classes suffer.
english.literal: How oneself suffers both sides of the social classes.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Usted sufre en su mansión, yo sufro en los arrabales.

english.contextual: You suffer in your mansion, I suffer in the slums.
english.literal: You suffer in your mansion, I suffer in the outskirts.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Me dijo: Vente conmigo, que sepa no estoy sola.

english.contextual: He told me: Come with me, so you know I'm not alone.
english.literal: He said to me: Come with me, that (s)he knows I am not alone.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Se hizo en el pelo una cola, fuimos al bar donde estaban.

english.contextual: She made a ponytail, we went to the bar where they were.
english.literal: She did in the hair a ponytail, we went to the bar where they were.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Entramos precisamente él abrazaba una chica.

english.contextual: We entered, precisely he was hugging a girl.
english.literal: We entered precisely he hugged a girl.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Mira si es grande el destino y esta ciudad es chica.

english.contextual: Look how big destiny is and this city is small.
english.literal: Look if it is big the destiny and this city is girl.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Era mi mujer.

english.contextual: It was my wife.
english.literal: It was my woman.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: ¿Qué es lo que hace un taxista cuando un caballero coincide con su mujer en horario y esmero?

english.contextual: What does a taxi driver do when a gentleman coincides with his wife in schedule and effort?
english.literal: What is what does a taxi driver when a gentleman coincides with his woman in schedule and effort?

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Desde aquella noche, ellos juegan a engañarnos.

english.contextual: Since that night, they've been playing a game to deceive us.
english.literal: From that night, they play to deceive-us.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Se ven en el mismo bar.

english.contextual: They see each other at the same bar.
english.literal: Themselves see in the same bar.

historia-de-taxi-ricardo-arjona.content: Y la rubia para el taxi, siempre a las diez en el mismo lugar.

english.contextual: And the blonde woman calls for a taxi, always at ten o'clock in the same place.
english.literal: And the blonde for the taxi, always to the ten in the same place.
